amendment.description: To impose a civil penalty for noncompliance with certain reporting requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4727 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4727 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator McCaskill to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3961; text: CR S3961) To impose a civil penalty for noncompliance with certain reporting requirements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4727 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator McCaskill to Amendment SA 4707.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4727 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
